full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 510 MEMORANDUM OF REATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL RMANENT RESIDENCE Place Los Angeles, California A17 181 791 TC/245/SIO Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: File No. Sex NAME MAO, BETTY PEI-ING Female ADDRESS 720 South San Rafael, Pasadena, California 91105 NATIONALITY DATE OF BIRTH PLACE OF BIRTH China Oct. 27, 1914 Shaughai, China COUNTRY TO WHICH CHARGEABLE (If any) PREFERENCE: (If any) PRIORITY DATE China Nonpreference 7-9-69 REMARKS Section Sec. 203(a)(8) NONPREFERENCE: Individual section 212(a)(14) certification issued; Blanket section 212(a)(14) certification issued; Section 212(a)(14) certification not required because .
